query:
Create a Vue component `src/components/FormField.tsx` using JSX (TSX) that:

1. Renders a form field wrapper with CSS class "form-field"
2. Has a label element with class "form-label" that points to the input using `for` attribute
3. Has an input element with class "form-input" and an `id` attribute
4. Accepts `label`, `id`, and `modelValue` props
5. Emits update:modelValue when the input changes

Use proper Vue JSX conventions for attributes.
